modName: Sporty Sexy Sweat - wet body skin texture - CBBE UNP UNPB ADEC Vanilla

descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-6.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/28946-1-1356553942.jpg[/img]
Sporty Sexy Sweat is an specular texture mod which will enable sweaty wet body for your favorite female character. Your character will have a sexy glistening wet skin which will enhance the realism, sexiness and all the fine details of the skin.
A specular map is a texture map which contains the 'gloss' information. With the right information this results in a shiny wet surface. Not that this is very subject to different effects in different locations as well as your specific skyrim configuration.
Especially ENB post-processing mods will greatly change the effect you will have.

Sporty Sexy Sweat is available for CBBE v3, Dimonized UNP (and variations such ass UNPB, UNP Skinny etc), ADEC and Vanilla (Skyrim default) body meshes.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]CBBE - Calientes Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]UNP - DIMONIZED UNP female body[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14899]UNP - UNP Blessed female body[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5390]ADEC - Acdale's Eye candy body ADEC[/url]


[size=6][b][color=lightblue]Videos & reviews[/color][/b][/size]
==============================================================================
Sweet [s]rant[/s] article about this mod on [url=http://kotaku.com/5972220/the-latest-sexy-skyrim-mod-makes-your-characterperpetually-sweaty]Kotaku[/url]. Read the comments, lol :)

Check @ 4:41 for Sporty Sexy Sweat

Check @ 4:45 for Sporty Sexy Sweat

[size=6][b][color=lightblue]Installation[/color][/b][/size]
==============================================================================
Install through NNM or unpack the contents to the Data folder

[size=4][b][color=lightblue]Optional face sweat level[/color][/b][/size]
==============================================================================
The default face sweat level is only a basic glossy face. To increase this with drops and streams of sweat you need to manually replace the file 'femalehead_s.dds' which is located in 'SkyrimDatatexturesactorscharacterfemale'.
In this folder you will also find the files:
[code]
- femalehead_s_default.dds
- femalehead_s_medium.dds
- femalehead_s_high.dds
[/code]

Simply backup delete the existing the original 'femalehead_s.dds' and rename one of the options to 'femalehead_s.dds'


[size=4][b][color=lightblue]ENB Tweaking[/color][/b][/size]
==============================================================================
All ENB mods have custom settings which control the specularity (shinyness) of the game. This is separated in three different environments: Day, night and interiors.
Most tend to reduce the shinyness in-game so this step may be mandatory.

In the file enbseries.ini (these settings are taken from Unbleak ENB) you need to locate the following 9 settings:

[code][color=green]
//higher value is wider shine range
SpecularAmountMultiplierDay=1.42
SpecularAmountMultiplierNight=1.5
SpecularAmountMultiplierInterior=1.32

//Focus on editing these values, a lower value is more powerfull shine (higher shine contrast)
SpecularPowerMultiplierDay=0.5 //default 3.5
SpecularPowerMultiplierNight=0.5 //default 3.5
SpecularPowerMultiplierInterior=0.5 //default 3.5

//you can ignore these as they have very little effect
SpecularFromLightDay=0.05
SpecularFromLightNight=0.05
SpecularFromLightInterior=0.05
[/color][/code]


[size=4][b][color=lightblue]When using a Race mod - The Ashen, Temptress etc[/color][/b][/size]
==============================================================================
1) Determine which body is used by the race mod (UNP, CBBE, ADEC, Vanilla)
2) Manually download the correct file and extract the files 'femalebody_1_s.dds', 'femalehead_s.dds' and 'femalehands_1_s.dds'
3) Place the file in the texture directory of the mod (the mods often use separate texture files)

Examples:

Ashen: SkyrimdatatexturesactorscharacterOrientalfemale
Temptress: SkyrimDatatexturestemptressactorscharacterfemale
Lunari: texturesbhaktilunariactorscharacterfemale





[size=6][b][color=lightblue]File contents / Uninstallation[/color][/b][/size]
==============================================================================
[code][color=green]
SkyrimDatatexturesactorscharacterfemalefemalebody_1_s.dds
SkyrimDatatexturesactorscharacterfemalefemalehands_1_s.dds
SkyrimDatatexturesactorscharacterfemalefemalehead_s.dds
[/color][/code]

Notes
=======================================
- Sporty Sexy Sweat textures are generated through the original body mod textures and should not extra seams.
- Overwrites only the existing specular (gloss) map
- Does NOT affect the body or face texture or muscle definition of the model



[size=6][b][color=lightblue]Comptibility with body mods[/color][/b][/size]
==============================================================================
Dimonized UNP / UNP Blessed / Skinny use "UNP"
Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition CBBE / CBBEv3m use "CBBE"
Acdale EyeCandy Body ADEC uses "ADEC"
Standard skyrim body mesh uses "Vanilla"



[size=6][b][color=lightblue]Mods used in screenshots[/color][/b][/size]
==============================================================================
- UNPB body
- Custom diffuse textures (body / face / hands)
- Sporty Sexy Map normal map (muscle definition)
- Apachii hairs
- Skyheels
- UNP SWF bikini (texture available in optional downloads, see below)



[size=6][b][color=lightblue]FAQ[/color][/b][/size]
==============================================================================
Q: Why does the sweat appear white like c******* (cookie glacing lol)?
A: A specular map can only emit shine in one color which is set in the body mesh, in our case: white. With moderate specularity settings it should look similar to water; only reflective with a light source under a certain direction. However when these settings are too high, it will appear white. See ENB tweaking for more info.

Q: What is this mod?
A: This mod is only a 'shine texture' and doesn't contain little information how your body actually looks like in game. It doesn't make your character nude or muscular, only shiny!

Q: I don't see any changes / I can't get it to work
A1: You're probably installing the files to the wrong directory because you're using a different race (Lunari, temptress etc etc). Extract the textures and copy them to this mod's texture folder.
A2: Your ENB configuration has toned down the specularity. See solution above @ENB tweaking

Q:What mod is the island where you took the screenshots?
A: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27747][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/27747-1-1357043792.jpg[/img][/url]

Q: What is the bikini you're using?
A: It is a custom re-texture of the SFW bikini UNPB Replace and it's available as an optional download. Note that you do first need to download the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14899]SFW bikini UNPB Replace[/url] for this to work. Also do not upload pictures with nipples or genitals here :)

Q: Can you make this only to function indoors / when it's hot etc?
A: No I cannot :) I simply don't have the knowledge. I'm 'only' a texturer ;)

Q: Can you make this for Khajit or Argonian?
A: Unfortunately I don't have the time nor the interest to work on anthropomorphic characters. Besides, reptiles are cold-blooded creatures and cats sweat through their paws :) You're free to use the assets though...

Q: Is there a male version?
A: I currently working on this one. More info coming soon...

Q: Can you make X changes for me?
A: I definitely don't have the time to cater all requests. You're free to use the assets though...

Q: I am highly offended / disgusted / confused / sexually confused by this mod! / Why would you create such sexist mod?
A: Please do post a comment though, I will always read them and I do enjoy a good laugh :)

Q: I am the creator of a a complete new body mesh, can you help me with my texture maps?
A: Please send me some screenshots of the model. If I like the body mesh I will definitely make time for you.

Q: Why is this file soooo big, I'm getting CTD's over here!
A: All DXT compression methods used in Skyrim have pretty heavy compression artifacts. The used compression in this file is 8.8.8 RGB which is lossless. If you have crashes you can try a texture compressor (also available on the Nexus). In my opinion it's better to reduce the image size to 1024 with no compression than 2048 with heavy compression...

Q: What the heck is a specular map?
A: A specular map allows an additional lighting per pixel enabling a shiny effect on game models. This mod uses it to create a diffuse gloss on the entire body as well as some drops and streams of sweat.

Q: Why do your screens look so awesome?
A: I have a rather high-end system and have custom-made body textures. My basic skin texture is 8192 x 8192 pixels, my normal map is 2048 x 2048 pixels and my specular map is also 4096 x 4096. You do the math :)

Q: What can I do to thank you?
A: Endorsements are only to rank the mod on the Nexus site. Though this is very kind already, I will always prefer screenshots to see what everybody is doing with their game.
